level.text: Fuel providers shall make clean fuels available to covered fleet operators at locations at which covered fleet vehicles are fueled.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Section 3(a) of the Clean Fuel Fleet Vehicle Program and Alternative Fuels Incentives Amendment Act of 1994, D.C. Law 10-201, 41 DCR 7178, 7190 (November 4, 1994).
